short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly calculate percentages in 3 different ways!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly calculate percentages in 3 different ways!  You can quickly calculate:
 - What is X percent of Y?
 - X is what percent of Y?
 - Percent increases and decreases
